sub-events.comment: mounting equipment
adding Capacitors

check if a Targeting Computer is being added and if there's already one installed
adding Shield Generators, no more than one per section, and none in the Hull

events.comment: delete the item from ship section

sub-events.comment: check if value of component to be removed matches the item in the array
check if removing equipment...
if removing ECM, then reset ECM to 0
if removing a Targeting Computer, then reset TC to 0
if removing a Shield Generator, reset its section to 0
...or weapon
